variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| fieldsAdd softwareTechnologies, processType
| summarize collectDistinct(processType)

0.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| fieldsAdd softwareTechnologies, dt.entity.host=belongs_to[dt.entity.host]
| lookup sourceField:dt.entity.host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host.", [ fetch dt.entity.host | fields id, entity.name]

//| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.host)
| expand softwareTechnologies
| filter contains(softwareTechnologies,$processType)
| parse softwareTechnologies, "'type' LD:type, 'edition' LD:edition, 'version:' NSPACE:version"
| summarize type=collectDistinct(type), edition=collectDistinct(edition), versions=collectDistinct(version),   by:{host.entity.name}
